entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -3.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Ottawa Macdonald-Cartier Int'l Airport 03:15 AM EST Friday 20 January 2023

Temperature: -3.4°C

Visibility: 4.8 km

Dewpoint: -4.3°C

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow at times heavy. Temperature steady near minus 4.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy with risk of freezing drizzle. Amount 10 cm. Wind east 20 km/h becoming light after midnight. Temperature steady near minus 4. Wind chill minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 12:53 AM EST Friday 20 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Periods of snow. Temperature steady near minus 3.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow. Risk of freezing drizzle early in the morning. Amount 2 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming light near noon. Temperature steady near minus 3. Wind chill minus 10 in the morning and minus 5 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 12:53 AM EST Friday 20 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending in the evening then cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 5. Wind chill near minus 7. Forecast issued 12:53 AM EST Friday 20 January 2023
